article_title: Central Ohio hospitals’ community help shifts away from charity care
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Central Ohio’s three adult hospital systems spent a record $531.5 million to benefit the community in fiscal year 2013, which ended June 30. Nationwide Children’s Hospital spent $122 million in calendar 2012, the most recent year for which numbers are available.
